Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
  VendingMachine

public class VendingMachine
extends java.lang.Object

A vending machine holds cans of soda. To buy a can of soda, the customer needs to insert a token into the machine. When the token is inserted, a can drops from the can reservoir into the product delivery slot. The vending machine can be filled with more cans. The goal is to determine how many cans and tokens are in the machine at any given time.

Version:
18 September 2015
Author:
Sarah Mansfield
